Breakfast.details: Organic Power Pancakes: 1 cup organic whole wheat flour, 2 organic eggs, 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 scoop organic vanilla protein powder, 1 mashed organic banana, 2 tbsp organic maple syrup, 1/4 cup organic chopped walnuts
Breakfast.instructions: Mix ingredients, cook pancakes. Top with maple syrup and walnuts.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Protein Yogurt Parfait: 1 cup organic full-fat Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup organic granola, 1/2 cup organic mixed berries, 1 tbsp organic honey, 1 scoop organic vanilla protein powder
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Layer yogurt mixed with protein powder, granola, and berries. Drizzle with honey.

Lunch.details: Organic Salmon Quinoa Bowl: 6 oz grilled organic salmon, 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic roasted vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, onions), 1/2 organic avocado, 2 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 tbsp organic lemon juice
Lunch.instructions: Grill salmon, roast vegetables. Combine all ingredients in a bowl, dress with olive oil and lemon juice.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Nut Butter Energy Balls: 1/2 cup organic almond butter, 1/4 cup organic honey, 1 cup organic rolled oats, 1/4 cup organic ground flaxseed, 1/4 cup organic dark chocolate chips
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Mix ingredients, roll into balls, and refrigerate.

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Mass Gainer Shake: 2 scoops organic mass gainer protein powder, 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 organic banana, 2 tbsp organic peanut butter, 1/2 cup organic oats

Dinner.details: Organic Beef and Sweet Potato Bowl: 8 oz organic grass-fed ground beef, 1 large organic sweet potato (cubed and roasted), 1 cup organic sautéed kale, 1/4 cup organic feta cheese, 2 tbsp organic olive oil
Dinner.instructions: Cook beef, roast sweet potato, sauté kale. Combine in a bowl and top with feta cheese.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Protein Pudding: 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 scoop organic chocolate protein powder, 2 tbsp organic chia seeds, 1 tbsp organic cocoa powder, 1 tbsp organic honey
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix ingredients and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before consuming.
